item.description:
Fun, Sports, Relaxing and Socializing! Don't miss our 2010 / Annual Fun Meetup Getaway , Book Today at http://FunMeetupGetaw... !!
Call Greg @ 917-868-4268 if interested,
Book Today and Mention FUN MEETUP to save $ off the weekend & Get a FREE DRINK Book !!! (Type Fun Meetup in the How did you hear about box) call me @ 917-868-4268 if any questions ! http://FunMeetupGetaw... click Book Now on the right!
Note: Getaway Weekends typically sell out in advance, Advance Reservations are required , call 917-868-4268 if questions, Usually sell out weeks before the event !!!
Fun Meetup Presents Fun Meetup Getaway, Fun Summer Weekend !
Join us in Kent , CT, for the July 23rd Weekend ! Bus leaves friday July
23rd at 5:30pm from the upper east side, NYC, or meet us up there !
Weekends sell out in advance (up to 1-2 weeks before we leave) and
reservations are required! Book Today at http://FunMeetupGetaw...
and click book now on the right or call me @917-868-4268 if questions!
Join us for this amazing weekend !!! (make sure to mention
Fun Meetup if booking by phone or type Fun Meetup in the comment box
if booking online to get the discount and some free drinks !
http://FunMeetupGetaw...
The hottest sports, adventures and parties are at Club Getaway this
Summer Weekend! In addition to all the cool Getaway stuff like
waterskiing, the flying trapeze, tennis, mountain biking, volleyball
and rock climbing, we've got a weekend packed with great special
events.
Join us for this great weekend, Don't get closed out, Book
Today at http://FunMeetupGetaw... and click book now on the right
or call me @ 917-868-4268 if questions !
any questions, call me @ 917-868-4268,
Book now at http://FunmeetupGetaw... click Book Now on the right, select any summer weekend and type Fun Meetup when reserving for your FREE FUN MEETUP DRINKS BOOK !!!
BOOK ANY CAMP / Getaway WEEKEND and Mention FUN MEETUP to save $ & Get FREE DRINKS , http://FunMeetupGetaw... , Join us this summer!!!
item.how_to_find_us: call Greg @ 917-868-4268 meet at dinner Friday Night !!!

group.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org

item.name: Fun Meetup & Boston Meetup Presents FunMeetupGetaway
